body_html:
For now you could cite our NIPS 2017 workshop paper that discusses just the autodiff engine of PyTorch:

@article{paszke2017automatic,
  title={Automatic differentiation in PyTorch},
  author={Paszke, Adam and Gross, Sam and Chintala, Soumith and Chanan, Gregory and Yang, Edward and DeVito, Zachary and Lin, Zeming and Desmaison, Alban and Antiga, Luca and Lerer, Adam},
  year={2017}
}

The paper is located here: https://openreview.net/forum?id=BJJsrmfCZ

Once we release a full paper (with more authors), I will update this thread with a new citation.
